Documentation
Exolane Protocol
Non-custodial leveraged trading on Arbitrum One. Predictable costs, transparent risk, on-chain rules.

#Welcome to Exolane

#Trade with Confidence

Exolane is a non-custodial leveraged trading protocol built on Arbitrum One. We're designed for traders who value predictable costs, transparent risk, and on-chain enforceable rules.

#Why Exolane?

#Get Started
